item.title: Why you should get vaccinated
item.description: If you know me, I love metaphors to recreate things in way everyday people could understand. Credits to uhh… well, every single vaccination article and video I’ve seen. I’m just gonna use a different tactic here.

item.title: Why COVID-19 isn't just a virus
item.description: A virus physically destructs your body. It gives you fevers and cough. It kills people within weeks. It multiplies and spreads and kills more people. But COVID-19 isn’t just a virus.
